recipesJson.name: Pineapple cheesecake
recipesJson.author: VladimirosStafylidis
recipesJson.description: A Pineapple cheesecake. Used the same cheesecake stone with "Strawberry cheesecake" recipe. I believe Pineapple (INAWERA) is one of the best pineapple flavors along with the Mississippi (INW) (if you like a creamy version).

reviews.text: All though it's not here this an excellent recipe I mix on ELR
